Descriptions.Text: Your barrier's cooldown recharges {1}% faster while the shield persists.
Phoenix Flames and Dragon's Breath always critically strike and Dragon's Breath contributes to Hot Streak.
Alters the fabric of time, returning you to your current location and health when cast a second time, or after {1} seconds.  Effect negated by long distance or death.
When Clearcast, Arcane Missiles fires {1} additional missiles.
Arcane Barrage deals an additional {1}% damage against targets below {2}% health.
Direct damage you deal to enemies affected by Touch of the Magi, causes an explosion that deals {1} Arcane damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond {2} targets.

Clearcasting can now stack {1} additional times, and increases the damage of Arcane Missiles by {2}% per stack.

Clearcasting no longer reduces the mana cost of Arcane Explosion.
Causes an explosion of magic around the caster, dealing {1} Arcane damage to all enemies within {2} yards.

Causes an explosion of magic around the caster, dealing {1} Arcane damage to all enemies within {2} yards.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {3} Arcane Charge if any targets are hit.}
Summon a Familiar that attacks your enemies and increases your maximum mana by {1}% for {2} min.
Each time Arcane Missiles hits an enemy, the damage of your next Arcane Barrage is increased by {1}%. This effect stacks up to {2} times.

Infuses the target with brilliance, increasing their Intellect by {1}% for {2} min.  

If the target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected.
Launches five waves of Arcane Missiles at the enemy over {1} sec, causing a total of {2} Arcane damage.

Launches an Arcane Orb forward from your position, traveling up to {1} yards, dealing {2} Arcane damage to enemies it passes through.

{FFFFFFFF|Grants {3} Arcane Charge when cast and every time it deals damage.}
Arcane Surge lasts an additional {1} sec and grants {2}% increased Spell Damage.

Expend all of your current mana to annihilate your enemy target and nearby enemies for up to {1} Arcane damage based on Mana spent. Deals reduced damage beyond {2} targets.

For the next {3} sec, your Mana Regeneration is increased by {4}% and Spell Damage is increased by {5}%.
Consuming Arcane Charges increases your Haste by {1}% for {2} seconds, stacks up to {3} times.
Reduces magic damage taken by {1}%.
Builds a sphere of Arcane energy, gaining power over {1} sec. Upon release, the sphere passes through any barriers, knocking enemies back and dealing up to {2} Arcane damage.
For each Arcane Charge, Arcane Barrage hits {1} additional nearby target for {2}% damage.
Causes an explosion around yourself, dealing {1} Fire damage to all enemies within {2} yards, knocking them back, and reducing movement speed by {3}% for {4} sec.

Shields you in flame, absorbing {1} damage for {2} sec.

Melee attacks against you cause the attacker to take {3} Fire damage.
Teleports you forward {1} yds or until reaching an obstacle, and frees you from all stuns and bonds.
Ice shards pelt the target area, dealing {1} Frost damage over {2} sec and reducing movement speed by {3}% for {4} sec.
Whenever you attempt to chill a target, you gain Bone Chilling, increasing spell damage you deal by {1}% for {2} sec, stacking up to {3} times.
Frostbolt has a {1}% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Flurry and cause your next Flurry to deal {2}% increased damage.
Phoenix Flames gains {1} additional charge.
Consuming a Mana Gem grants up to {1} Clearcasting stacks.

Fatal damage instead brings you to {1}% health and then burns you for {2}% of your maximum health over {3} sec.

While burning, movement slowing effects are suppressed and your movement speed is increased by {4}%.

This effect cannot occur more than once every {5} min.
Your Ice Lances against frozen targets increase the damage of your Ice Lances by {1}% for {2} sec, stacking up to {3} times.
Arcane Orb gains {1} additional charge.

Your Frost Nova and your Water Elemental's Freeze deals {1} Frost damage when the effect ends.

Damage is doubled if Frost Nova or Freeze are dispelled.
Arcane Barrage slows enemies by {1}% and increases your movement speed by {2}% for {3} sec.
For each {1} mana you spend, you have a {2}% chance to gain Clearcasting, making your next Arcane Missiles or Arcane Explosion free and channel {3}% faster.
Casting {1} Frostbolts or Flurries calls down a Frozen Orb toward your target. Hitting an enemy player counts as double.
Resets the cooldown of your Ice Barrier, Frost Nova, Cone of Cold, and Ice Block.
Engulfs you in flames for {1} sec, increasing your spells' critical strike chance by {2}% . Castable while casting other spells.
Calls down a series of {1} icy comets on and around the target, that deals up to {2} Frost damage to all enemies within {3} yds of its impacts.
Frozen Orb's damage is increased by {1}% and is now castable at a location with a {2} yard range but no longer moves.
Arcane Blast has a chance to grant Concentration, which causes your next Clearcasting to not be consumed.
Targets in a cone in front of you take {1} Frost damage and have movement slowed by {2}% for {3} sec.

Fireball applies Conflagration to the target, dealing an additional {1} Fire damage over {2} sec.

Enemies affected by either Conflagration or Ignite have a {3}% chance to flare up and deal {4} Fire damage to nearby enemies.
Conjures mana food for you and your allies. Conjured items disappear if logged out for more than {1} minutes.
Pyroblast's initial damage is increased by {1}% when the target is above {2}% health or below {3}% health.
Counters the enemy's spellcast, preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for {1} sec.
Increases Arcane Explosion and Arcane Blast damage by {1}%.

Your spells have a {1}% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain {2}% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.
While inside Ice Block, you heal for {1}% of your maximum health over the duration.
Your Frostbolt deals {1}% additional damage to Frozen targets.
Teleports you back to where you last Blinked. Only usable within {1} sec of Blinking.
Your Barriers heal you for {1}% of the damage absorbed.
Enemies in a cone in front of you take {1} Fire damage and are disoriented for {2} sec. Damage will cancel the effect.
Launch a bolt of ice at the enemy, dealing {1} Frost damage and granting you Brain Freeze.

When your barrier receives melee attacks, you have a {1}% chance to be granted {2} Fire Blast charge. 

Casting your barrier removes all snare effects.

When your barrier receives melee attacks, you have a {1}% chance to be granted Fingers of Frost. 

Casting your barrier removes all snare effects.

When your barrier receives melee attacks, you have a {1}% chance to be granted Clearcasting. 

Casting your barrier removes all snare effects.
Arcane damage dealt while above {1}% mana is increased by {2}%, Mana Regen while below {3}% is increased by {4}%.
Frozen Orb deals an additional {1}% damage and its duration is increased by {2} sec.
Increases your mana regeneration by {1}% for {2} sec.
Fire Blast increases your Mastery by {1}% for {2} sec. This effect stacks up to {3} times.
Ignite's damage has a {1}% chance to reduce the cooldown of Fire Blast by {2} sec.
Each consecutive critical strike you deal increases critical strike damage you deal by {1}%, up to {2}% for {3} sec.
While Combustion is active, your Fire Blast and Phoenix Flames recharge {1}% faster.

Frostbolt has a {1}% chance and Frozen Orb damage has a {2}% to grant a charge of Fingers of Frost.

Fingers of Frost causes your next Ice Lance to deal damage as if the target were frozen.

Maximum {3} charges.

Blasts the enemy for {1} Fire damage. 

{FFFFFFFF|Fire:} Castable while casting other spells. Always deals a critical strike.
Blasts the enemy for {1} Fire damage.
Throws a fiery ball that causes {1} Fire damage.
Damaging an enemy with {1} Fireballs or Pyroblasts causes your next Fireball to call down a Meteor on your target. Hitting an enemy player counts as double.
Consuming Hot Streak grants you {1}% increased Intellect for {2} sec. This effect stacks up to {3} times.
Your Fireball and Pyroblast spells always deal a critical strike when the target is above {1}% health.
If you have not cast Fireball for {1} sec, your next Fireball will deal {2}% increased damage with a {3}% reduced cast time.
Reduces the cooldown of Fire Blast by {1} seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by {2}.
Flamestrike leaves behind a patch of flames that burns enemies within it for {1} Fire damage over {2} sec.

After standing still in combat for {1} sec, your maximum health increases by {2}%, damage done increases by {3}%, and range of your Fire spells increase by {4} yards.

This effect stacks up to {5} times and lasts for {6} sec.
Calls down a pillar of fire, burning all enemies within the area for {1} Fire damage and reducing their movement speed by {2}% for {3} sec.
Each of your Icicles deals {1}% additional damage, and when an Icicle deals damage you have a {2}% chance to gain the Fingers of Frost effect.
The cooldown of Blink is reduced by {1} sec.

Unleash a flurry of ice, striking the target {1} times for a total of {2} Frost damage. Each hit reduces the target's movement speed by {3}% for {4} sec and applies Winter's Chill to the target.

Winter's Chill causes the target to take damage from your spells as if it were frozen.
Standing still for {1} sec grants you Foresight, allowing you to cast while moving for {2} sec. This duration begins when you start moving.
Your Frostbolt has a {1}% chance to hit up to {2} additional targets.

Enemies hit by Cone of Cold are frozen in place for {1} sec instead of snared.

When your roots expire or are dispelled, your target is snared by {2}%, decaying over {3} sec.
Frozen Orb makes Blizzard instant cast and increases its damage done by {1}% for {2} sec.
While Frozen Orb is active, you gain Fingers of Frost every {1} sec.
All of your snare effects reduce the target's movement speed by an additional {1}%.
Increases Mastery by {1}% for each charge of Phoenix Flames off cooldown and your direct-damage critical strikes reduce its cooldown by {2} sec.

Places a Frost Bomb on the target. After {1} sec, the bomb explodes, dealing {2} Frost damage to the target and {3} Frost damage to all other enemies within {4} yards. All affected targets are slowed by {5}% for {6} sec.
Blasts enemies within {1} yds of you for {2} Frost damage and freezes them in place for {3} sec. Damage may interrupt the freeze effect.
Gives your Chill effects a {1}% chance to freeze the target for {2} sec.
Launches a bolt of frost at the enemy, causing {1} Frost damage and slowing movement speed by {2}% for {3} sec.

Launches an orb of swirling ice up to {1} yards forward which deals up to {2} Frost damage to all enemies it passes through. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets. Grants {4} charge of Fingers of Frost when it first damages an enemy.

Enemies damaged by the Frozen Orb are slowed by {5}% for {6} sec.
Frostbolt grants you Fingers of Frost and Brain Freeze {1}% more often.
Flurry has a {1}% chance each hit to call down an icy comet, crashing into your target and nearby enemies for {2} Frost damage.

Conjures a massive spike of ice, and merges your current Icicles into it. It impales your target, dealing {1} damage plus all of the damage stored in your Icicles, and freezes the target in place for {2} sec. Damage may interrupt the freeze effect.

Requires {3} Icicles to cast.

{FFFFFFFF|Passive:} Ice Lance no longer launches Icicles.
Increases damage of Fireball and Scorch by {1}% but decreases your maximum health by {2}%.

Makes you invisible and untargetable for {1} sec, removing all threat. Any action taken cancels this effect.

You take {2}% reduced damage while invisible and for {3} sec after reappearing.
Hurls an immense fiery boulder that deals up to {1}% of the target's total health in Fire damage.
Casting Ice Lance on Frozen targets has a {1}% chance to generate an Icicle.
Damage dealt to enemies affected by Radiant Spark's vulnerability echo to your current enemy target and {1} nearby enemies for {2}% of the damage dealt.
Getting two direct-damage critical strikes in a row with Fire spells will make your next Pyroblast or Flamestrike spell instant cast, and cause double the normal Ignite damage.
When Hot Streak activates, you have a low chance to cause all Pyroblasts and Flamestrikes to have no cast time and be guaranteed critical strikes for {1} sec.

Shields you with ice, absorbing {1} damage for {2} sec.

Melee attacks against you reduce the attacker's movement speed by {3}%.

Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and damage for {1} sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move, or cast spells.

Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for {2} sec.
Each time Blizzard deals damage, the cooldown of Frozen Orb is reduced by {1} sec.
Makes your next Mage spell with a cast time shorter than {1} sec castable while moving. Unaffected by the global cooldown and castable while casting.
Your body turns into Ice, increasing your Frostbolt damage done by {1}% and granting immunity to stun and knockback effects. Lasts {2} sec.

Quickly fling a shard of ice at the target, dealing {1} Frost damage.

Ice Lance damage is tripled against frozen targets.
Causes a whirl of icy wind around the enemy, dealing {1} Frost damage to the target and reduced damage to all other enemies within {2} yards, and freezing them in place for {3} sec.
Conjures an Ice Wall {1} yards long that obstructs line of sight. The wall has {2}% of your maximum health and lasts up to {3} sec.
Frost Nova now has {1} charges.
Your damaging single target spell critical hits reduce the cooldown of Icy Veins by {1} sec.
Accelerates your spellcasting for {1} sec, granting {2}% haste and preventing damage from delaying your spellcasts.
Clearcasting has a {1}% increased chance to proc.
Arcane Blast has a {1}% chance to generate an additional Arcane Charge. If you were to gain an Arcane Charge while at maximum charges instead gain {2}% Arcane damage for {3} sec.
Increases Arcane Missiles damage by {1}%.
Clearcasting can stack up to {1} additional times.
Combustion grants Mastery equal to {1}% of your Critical Strike stat and lasts {2} sec longer.
Flamestrike's cast time is reduced by {1} sec and its radius is increased by {2}%.
Frost Nova duration is increased by {1} sec.
Prismatic Barrier further reduces magical damage taken by an additional {1}% and duration of harmful Magic effects by {2}%.

Casting Scorch on targets below {1}% health increase the target's damage taken from you by {2}% for {3} sec, stacking up to {4} times. 

Additionally, Scorch critical strikes increase your movement speed by {5}% for {6} sec.
Invisibility increases your movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.
Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to {1}% increased damage and then diminishing down to {2}% increased damage, cycling every {3} sec.
Enemies damaged by Flame Patch have a {1}% chance to erupt into a Living Bomb.
Turns you invisible over {1} sec, reducing threat each second. While invisible, you are untargetable by enemies. Lasts {2} sec. Taking any action cancels the effect.
Your Fireball, Pyroblast, Fire Blast, and Phoenix Flames critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown on Combustion by {1} sec.
Spellsteal steals all spells from the target, now has a {1} sec cooldown and costs {2}% more mana.

The target becomes a Living Bomb, taking {1} Fire damage over {2} sec, and then exploding to deal an additional {3} Fire damage to the target and reduced damage to all other enemies within {4} yards.

Other enemies hit by this explosion also become a Living Bomb, but this effect cannot spread further.
Frostbolt, Ice Lance, and Flurry deal {1}% increased damage.
Arcane Barrage grants you {1}% of your maximum mana per Arcane Charge spent.
You and your allies within {1} yards instantly become invisible for {2} sec. Dealing damage will cancel the effect.

Transforms all enemies within {1} yards into sheep, wandering around incapacitated for {2} min. While affected, the victims cannot take actions but will regenerate health very quickly. Damage will cancel the effect.

Only works on Beasts, Humanoids and Critters.
Slow applies to all enemies within {1} yds of your target.
Reduces the cooldown of Greater Invisibility by {1} sec.
Ignite deals {1}% more damage while Combustion is not active. Fire Blast spreads Ignite to {2} additional nearby targets during Combustion.

Reduces the cooldown of Alter Time by {1} sec. 

Alter Time resets the cooldown of Blink when you return to your original location.

Casting Frostbolt or Flurry grants you an Icicle. Casting Ice Lance causes all Icicles stored to begin launching at the target, each dealing {1} Frost damage.

Up to {2} Icicles can be stored. Any excess Icicles gained will be automatically launched.

Increases the damage of Frozen Orb by {3}%.

Your target burns for an additional {1}% over {2} sec of the total direct damage caused by your Fireball, Fire Blast, Scorch, Pyroblast, Phoenix Flames, and Flamestrike. If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Ignite.

Ignite's damage has a {3}% chance to reduce the cooldown of Fire Blast by {4} sec.

Fire Blast causes your Ignites to spread to {5} nearby enemies.

Increases your Mana regeneration rate and maximum Mana by {1}%.

Arcane Charges increase the damage of Arcane Blast by an additional {2}% and Arcane Barrage by {3}%.

Increases all other Arcane damage by {4}%

Calls down a meteor which lands at the target location after {1} sec, dealing {2} Fire damage, split evenly between all targets within {3} yards, and burns the ground, dealing {4} Fire damage over {5} sec to all enemies in the area.

Creates {1} copies of you nearby for {2} sec, which cast spells and attack your enemies.

While your images are active damage taken is reduced by {3}%. Taking direct damage will cause one of your images to dissipate.
Consuming Clearcasting increases the damage of your next {1} Arcane Blasts by {2}%.

Places a Nether Tempest on the target which deals {1} Arcane damage over {2} sec to the target and nearby enemies within {3} yards. Limit {4} target. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Damage increased by {5}% per Arcane Charge.
Reduces the chance you will suffer a critical strike by {1}%.

Consuming Clearcasting reduces the cooldown of Arcane Orb by {1} sec.

Additionally, casting Arcane Missiles {2} times fires an Arcane Orb toward your target. Clearcast Arcane Missiles count as {3}.

Your spell critical strike damage is increased by {1}%. When your direct damage spells fail to critically strike a target, your spell critical strike chance is increased by {2}%, up to {3}% for {4} sec. 

When your spells critically strike Overflowing Energy is reset.
Flurry now has {1} charges.
Hurls a Phoenix that deals {1} Fire damage to the target and reduced damage to other nearby enemies.
Targets affected by your Ignite have a chance to erupt in flame, taking {1} additional Fire damage and reducing the remaining cooldown of Phoenix Flames by {2} sec.
Frostbolt and Icicle critical strike damage increased by {1}%.

Transforms the enemy into a sheep, wandering around incapacitated for {1} sec. While affected, the victim cannot take actions but will regenerate health very quickly. Damage will cancel the effect. Limit {2}.

Only works on Beasts, Humanoids and Critters.
Creates a portal, teleporting group members that use it to a Major City.
If an interrupt is used on you while you are not casting, gain {1}% Haste and become immune to crowd control, interrupt, and cast pushback effects for {2} sec.
Causes your next {1} Arcane Blasts to be instant cast.

Shields you with an arcane force, absorbing {1} damage and reducing magic damage taken by {2}% for {3} sec.

The duration of harmful Magic effects against you is reduced by {4}%.
After you Blink, you take {1}% less magical damage for {2} sec.
Arcane Charges further increase Mastery effectiveness of Arcane Blast and Arcane Barrage by {1}%.
Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes {1} Fire damage.

Consuming Hot Streak has a {1}% chance to make your next non-instant Pyroblast cast within {2} sec deal {3}% additional damage.

Maximum {4} stacks.
Your Fireball reduces the cooldown of your Combustion by {1} sec.
Casting Pyroblast or Flamestrike while Hot Streak is active has an {1}% chance to instantly reactivate Hot Streak.
Each time your Fireball fails to critically strike a target, it gains a stacking {1}% increased critical strike chance. Effect ends when Fireball critically strikes.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Counterspell reduces its cooldown by {1} sec.

Conjure a radiant spark that causes {1} Arcane damage instantly, and an additional {2} damage over {3} sec.

The target takes {4}% increased damage from your direct damage spells, stacking each time they are struck. This effect ends after {5} spells.

Channel an icy beam at the enemy for {1} sec, dealing {2} Frost damage every {3} sec and slowing movement by {4}%. Each time Ray of Frost deals damage, its damage and snare increases by {5}%.

Generates {6} charges of Fingers of Frost over its duration.
You are healed for {1}% of your maximum health whenever a Mirror Image dissipates due to direct damage.
Mirror Image's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec whenever a Mirror Image dissipates due to direct damage.
Removes all Curses from a friendly target.
Arcane Barrage deals {1}% increased damage per target it hits.
If Arcane Explosion hits at least {1} targets, it has a {2}% chance to generate an extra Arcane Charge.
Frost Nova can withstand {1}% more damage before breaking.
Summons a Ring of Fire for {1} sec at the target location. Enemies entering the ring burn for {2}% of their total health over {3} sec.

Summons a Ring of Frost for {1} sec at the target location. Enemies entering the ring are incapacitated for {2} sec. Limit {3} targets.

When the incapacitate expires, enemies are slowed by {4}% for {5} sec.
When you gain your third Arcane Charge, the cost of your next Arcane Blast or Arcane Missiles is reduced by {1}%.

Places a Rune of Power on the ground for {1} sec which increases your spell damage by {2}% while you stand within {3} yds.

Casting Combustion will also create a Rune of Power at your location.

Places a Rune of Power on the ground for {1} sec which increases your spell damage by {2}% while you stand within {3} yds.

Casting Icy Veins will also create a Rune of Power at your location.

Places a Rune of Power on the ground for {1} sec which increases your spell damage by {2}% while you stand within {3} yds.

Casting Arcane Power will also create a Rune of Power at your location.
Scorches an enemy for {1} Fire damage. Castable while moving.
Scorch deals {1}% increased damage and is a guaranteed Critical Strike when the target is below {2}% health.
Multiplies the critical strike chance of your spells against frozen targets by {1}, and adds an additional {2}% critical strike chance.

Draw power from the Night Fae, dealing {1} Nature damage over {2} sec to enemies within {3} yds. 

While channeling, your Mage ability cooldowns are reduced by {4} sec over {5} sec.
Teleports you {1} yards forward, unless something is in the way. Unaffected by the global cooldown and castable while casting.
Evocation grants {1} Arcane Charge, and while channeling Evocation, your Intellect is increased by {2}% every {3} sec. Lasts {4} sec.
While Icy Veins is active, each Frostbolt you cast reduces the cast time of Frostbolt by {1}% and increases its damage by {2}%, stacking up to {3} times.

Clearcasting allows Arcane Missiles to be channeled while moving.

Evocation can be channeled while moving.
Reduces the target's movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.
Slows a group member's falling speed for {1} sec.
Icy Veins grants a charge of Brain Freeze and Fingers of Frost.

Summon a strong Blizzard that surrounds you for {1} sec that slows enemies by {2}% and deals {3} Frost damage every {4} sec. 

Enemies that are caught in Snowdrift for {5} sec consecutively become Frozen in ice, stunned for {6} sec.
Blizzard has an {1}% chance to increase the damage of your next Cone of Cold by {2}%, stacking up to {3} times.
Steals a beneficial magic effect from the target. This effect lasts a maximum of {1} min.
Frostbolt and Flurry have a {1}% chance to generate {2} Icicles.

Your Ice Lance and Icicles now deal {1}% increased damage, and hit a second nearby target for {2}% of their damage.

Your Ebonbolt and Glacial Spike also hit a second nearby target for {3}% of its damage.
Your Frost spells deal {1}% more damage to targets that are rooted and frozen.
Summons a Water Elemental to follow and fight for you.
After consuming {1} Hot Streaks, your next non-instant Pyroblast or Flamestrike cast within {2} sec grants you Combustion for {3} sec.
Pulses arcane energy around the target enemy or ally, dealing {1} Arcane damage to all enemies within {2} yards, and knocking them upward. A primary enemy target will take {3}% increased damage.
Teleports you to a major city.
Pyroblast has a {1}% reduced cast time and a {2}% increased critical strike chance. The duration of Combustion is reduced by {3}%.
Gain a shield that absorbs {1}% of your maximum health for {2} sec after you Blink.
Envelops you in a temporal shield for {1} sec. {2}% of all damage taken while shielded will be instantly restored when the shield ends.
Increases your movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec after casting Blink and {3}% for {4} sec after returning from Alter Time.
While you have Temporal Displacement or other similar effects, you may use Time Warp to grant yourself {1}% Haste for {2} sec.

Icy Veins' duration is increased by {1} sec.

Your Ice Lances against frozen targets extend your Icy Veins by an additional {2} sec.
At any moment, you have a chance to gain Combustion for {1} sec, {2} Fire Blast charge, or Time Warp for {3} sec.
At any moment, you have a chance to gain Icy Veins for {1} sec, Fingers of Frost, or Time Warp for {2} sec.
At any moment, you have a chance to gain Arcane Surge for {1} sec, Clearcasting, or Time Warp for {2} sec.
Casting Fire Blast reduces the cooldown of your loss of control abilities by {1} sec.
Casting Ice Lance on Frozen targets reduces the cooldown of your loss of control abilities by {1} sec.
Casting Clearcasting Arcane Missiles reduces the cooldown of your loss of control abilities by {1} sec.

Warp the flow of time, increasing haste by {1}% for all party and raid members for {2} sec.

Allies will be unable to benefit from Bloodlust, Heroism, or Time Warp again for {3} min.
Increases Haste by {1}%.
Increases Critical Strike chance by {1}%.

Applies Touch of the Magi to your current target, accumulating {1}% of the damage you deal to the target for {2} sec, and then exploding for that amount of Arcane damage to the target and reduced damage to all nearby enemies.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {3} Arcane Charges.}
Greatly increases the effect of Blast Wave's knockback. Blast Wave's cooldown is reduced by {1} seconds.
Ignite deals {1}% additional damage. When you activate Combustion, you gain {2}% Critical Strike, and up to {3} nearby allies gain {4}% Critical Strike for {5} sec.
The cooldown of Ice Block is reduced by {1} sec.
Increases Frostbolt damage by {1}%. Fingers of Frost empowered Ice Lances deal {2}% increased damage to Frozen targets.
Flamestrike reduces the cast time of Flamestrike by {1}% and increases its damage by {2}% for {3} sec.
